text.div:
conditionSubjectNameSearchParameter

Parameter subject.name:string

Searches for condition based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?subject:Patient.name={name}

ResourceCondition
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesCondition
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: conditionSubjectNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for condition based on the patient's full or partial name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?subject:Patient.name={name}
